verses.verse: After<WG3326> these<WG5023> things Jesus<WG2424> showed<WG5319> himself<WG1438> again<WG3825> to the disciples<WG3101> at<WG1909> the sea<WG2281> of Tiberias;<WG5085> and on this<WG3779> wise showed<WG5319> he himself.

There were together<WG3674> Simon<WG4613> Peter,<WG4074> and Thomas<WG2381> called<WG3004> Didymus,<WG1324> and Nathanael<WG3482> of Cana<WG2580> in Galilee,<WG1056> and the sons of Zebedee,<WG2199> and two<WG1417> other<WG243> of his disciples.<WG3101>

Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> said<WG3004> to them, I go<WG5217> a fishing.<WG232> They say<WG3004> to him, We also<WG2532> go<WG2064> with you. They went<WG1831> forth,<WG1831> and entered<WG305> into<WG1519> a ship<WG4143> immediately;<WG2117> and that night<WG3571> they caught<WG4084> nothing.<WG3762>
But when the morning<WG4405> was now<WG2235> come,<WG1096> Jesus<WG2424> stood<WG2476> on<WG1519> the shore:<WG123> but the disciples<WG3101> knew<WG1492> not that it was Jesus.<WG2424>
Then<WG3767> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them, Children,<WG3813> have<WG2192> you any<WG3387> meat? <WG4371> They answered<WG611> him, No.<WG3756>

And he said<WG2036> to them, Cast<WG906> the net<WG1350> on<WG1519> the right<WG1188> side<WG3313> of the ship,<WG4143> and you shall find. <WG2147> They cast<WG906> therefore,<WG3767> and now<WG3765> they were not able<WG2480> to draw<WG1670> it for the multitude<WG4128> of fishes.<WG2486>

Therefore<WG3767> that disciple<WG3101> whom<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> loved<WG25> said<WG3004> to Peter,<WG4074> It is the Lord.<WG2962> Now<WG3767> when Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> heard<WG191> that it was the Lord,<WG2962> he girt<WG1241> his fisher's<WG1903> coat<WG1903> to him, (for he was naked,<WG1131>) and did cast<WG906> himself<WG1438> into<WG1519> the sea.<WG2281>

And the other<WG243> disciples<WG3101> came<WG2064> in a little<WG4142> ship;<WG4142> (for they were not far<WG3112> from land,<WG1093> but as it were two<WG1250> hundred<WG1250> cubits,<WG4083>) dragging<WG4951> the net<WG1350> with fishes.<WG2486>
As soon then<WG3767> as they were come<WG576> to land,<WG1093> they saw<WG991> a fire of coals<WG439> there, and fish<WG3795> laid<WG1945> thereon,<WG1945> and bread.<WG740>
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them, Bring<WG5342> of the fish<WG3795> which<WG3739> you have now<WG3568> caught. <WG4084>

Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> went<WG305> up, and drew<WG1670> the net<WG1350> to land<WG1093> full<WG3324> of great<WG3173> fishes,<WG2486> an hundred<WG1540> and fifty<WG4004> and three:<WG5140> and for all there were so<WG5118> many,<WG5118> yet was not the net<WG1350> broken.<WG4977>

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them, Come <WG1205> and dine. <WG709> And none<WG3762> of the disciples<WG3101> dared<WG5111> ask<WG1833> him, Who<WG5101> are<WG1488> you? knowing<WG1492> that it was the Lord.<WG2962>
Jesus<WG2424> then<WG3767> comes,<WG2064> and takes<WG2983> bread,<WG740> and gives<WG1325> them, and fish<WG3795> likewise.<WG3668>
This<WG5124> is now<WG2235> the third<WG5154> time that Jesus<WG2424> showed<WG5319> himself to his disciples,<WG3101> after that he was risen<WG1453> from the dead.<WG3498>

So<WG3767> when<WG3753> they had dined,<WG709> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to Simon<WG4613> Peter,<WG4074> Simon, <WG4613> son of Jonas,<WG2495> love<WG25> you me more<WG4119> than these? <WG5130> He said<WG3004> to him, Yes,<WG3483> Lord;<WG2962> you know<WG1492> that I love<WG5368> you. He said<WG3004> to him, Feed<WG1006> my lambs. <WG721>

He said<WG3004> to him again<WG3825> the second<WG1208> time, Simon, <WG4613> son of Jonas,<WG2495> love<WG25> you me? He said<WG3004> to him, Yes,<WG3483> Lord;<WG2962> you know<WG1492> that I love<WG5368> you. He said<WG3004> to him, Feed<WG4165> my sheep. <WG4263>

He said<WG3004> to him the third<WG5154> time, Simon, <WG4613> son of Jonas,<WG2495> love<WG5368> you me? Peter<WG4074> was grieved<WG3076> because<WG3754> he said<WG2036> to him the third<WG5154> time, Love<WG5368> you me? And he said<WG2036> to him, Lord,<WG2962> you know<WG1492> all<WG3956> things; you know<WG1097> that I love<WG5368> you. Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to him, Feed<WG1006> my sheep. <WG4263>

Truly,<WG281> truly,<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, When<WG3753> you were<WG2258> young,<WG3501> you gird<WG2224> yourself,<WG4572> and walked<WG4043> where<WG3699> you would:<WG2309> but when<WG3752> you shall be old,<WG1095> you shall stretch<WG1614> forth<WG1614> your hands,<WG5495> and another<WG243> shall gird<WG2224> you, and carry <WG5342> you where<WG3699> you would<WG2309> not.

This<WG5124> spoke<WG2036> he, signifying<WG4591> by what<WG4169> death<WG2288> he should glorify<WG1392> God.<WG2316> And when he had spoken<WG2036> this,<WG5124> he said<WG3004> to him, Follow<WG190> me.

Then<WG1161> Peter,<WG4074> turning<WG1994> about,<WG1994> sees<WG991> the disciple<WG3101> whom<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> loved<WG25> following;<WG190> which<WG3739> also<WG2532> leaned<WG377> on<WG1909> his breast<WG4738> at<WG1722> supper,<WG1173> and said,<WG2036> Lord,<WG2962> which<WG5101> is he that betrays<WG3860> you?
Peter<WG4074> seeing<WG1492> him said<WG3004> to Jesus,<WG2424> Lord,<WG2962> and what<WG5101> shall this<WG3778> man do?
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to him, If<WG1437> I will<WG2309> that he tarry<WG3306> till<WG2193> I come,<WG2064> what <WG5101> is that to you? follow<WG190> you me.

Then<WG3767> went<WG1831> this<WG3778> saying<WG3056> abroad<WG1831> among<WG1519> the brothers,<WG80> that that disciple<WG3101> should not die:<WG599> yet<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> not to him, He shall not die;<WG599> but, If<WG1437> I will that he tarry till<WG2193> I come,<WG2064> what<WG5101> is that to you?
This<WG3778> is the disciple<WG3101> which<WG3588> testifies<WG3140> of these<WG5130> things, and wrote<WG1125> these<WG5023> things: and we know<WG1492> that his testimony<WG3141> is true.<WG227>

And there are also<WG2532> many<WG4183> other<WG243> things which<WG3745> Jesus<WG2424> did,<WG4160> the which,<WG3748> if<WG1437> they should be written<WG1125> every<WG2596> one,<WG1520> I suppose<WG3633> that even<WG3761> the world<WG2889> itself<WG846> could not contain<WG5562> the books<WG975> that should be written.<WG1125> Amen.<WG281>
